doc.field: Communist Party of the United States of America Records
Communist Party of the United States of America Records
Subseries VI.B: National and State Elections
Subseries VI.B: National and State Elections

This small subseries holds records detailing Communist Party participation in and reaction to national and state elections; it also includes some materials from other minor political parties, including the American Labor and Progressive parties. Noteworthy materials include the several versions of the Communist Party election platform and a variety of distribution materials and strategic planning notes from the 1920s and 1930s. Other materials in this subseries include 2 audio recordings of regional campaign rallies, and several photographs from unidentified local campaigns.
